title: Hong Kong Open Source Conference 2019
description: Hong Kong Open Source Conference (HKOSCon) is the biggest annual open source event in Hong Kong.

videos.title: What's new in Haxe 4 - Andy Li
videos.where: Hong Kong Open Source Conference 2019 - Day 2 - Track 2 (Hall 05)
videos.description: An overview of the major version update from Haxe 3 to Haxe 4: New function syntaxes, null-safey, unicode, final keyword, interpreter rewrite (eval), HashLink VM, call-site inlining, inline markupâ€¦ and more!

videos.title: Haxe transpilation to PHP: static typing, arrow functions, metaprogramming and more - Aleksandr Kuzmenko
videos.where: Hong Kong Open Source Conference 2019 - Day 2 - Track 2 (Hall 05)
videos.description: Using Haxe as a replacement for PHP language on PHP server. Benefits, flaws, implementation details. Interoperation between Haxe and PHP. Code sharing between client and server.
